data.name: Andre
data.title: Fullstack Software Engineer | Cloud-Native & AI-Powered Systems
data.summary: Multidisciplinary fullstack software engineer with a unique blend of skills across AI/ML integration, DevOps, cloud-native deployments, real-time data systems, and enterprise platform extension (SAP/Salesforce). Experienced in designing and delivering scalable, intelligent SaaS solutions that combine performance, automation, and business impact.

projects.title: TransparAI
projects.purpose: An AI platform for analyzing complex legal and technical documents, with secure authentication and subscriptions.
projects.impact: Empowered users with AI-driven summaries and risk scores, improving decision-making in legal and technical fields.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, built the UI, integrated the Gemini AI API, and implemented secure auth and subscriptions.

projects.title: PlatformPro Jobs
projects.purpose: A job board for platform engineers with AI-powered candidate scoring and job description generation.
projects.impact: Streamlined hiring for platform roles with AI tools for recruiters and a dedicated dashboard for candidates.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, architected the app, implemented Firebase services, and integrated Genkit for AI features.
features: Stripe integration for job posting credits

projects.title: Freemap
projects.purpose: A platform connecting users by location for real-time video calls, enabling profile creation and map discovery.
projects.impact: Facilitates community building by combining location-based discovery with real-time video communication.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer, designed the backend, integrated real-time communication, and built the React frontend.

projects.title: Digital Starter
projects.purpose: A web app for structured digital learning or onboarding, with integrated AI assistance and progress tracking.
projects.impact: Streamlines user onboarding by offering a clear, multi-phase journey with AI assistance and progress tracking.
projects.role: Fullstack Developer & Project Architect, designed the user flow and integrated AI and authentication features.

workExperience.title: IT Support & Python Development (Apprentice)
workExperience.subtitle: HDI France, Paris
workExperience.description:
• Provided Level 1 & 2 technical support, managing user incidents for hardware, network, and software issues via GLPI.
  • Modernized and maintained legacy Python scripts, focusing on performance optimization, bug fixes, and code readability.
  • Developed automation scripts to streamline document exports, improving data accessibility and workflow efficiency.
  • Managed the IT asset lifecycle, including deployment, configuration, and network administration for user workstations and meeting room hardware (ClickShare).
